title: Sans-Serif Shirt
content:
Thought everyone might be interested in the Sans-Serif shirt  
 [Sans-Serif Shirt FOR SALE](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172612/http:/www.turnnocturnal.com/product/sans-serif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172612im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sans_square4_6683.jpg)

 [‹ • Typeface used for 'Masterfile' Stock Photo logo?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172612/http:/typophile.com/node/45484 "Go to previous forum topic") [indesign question : lines of text surounded by black box ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172612/http:/typophile.com/node/45462 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mattmc

comments.content: Tremendous. Are y0u selling them? Bob Trogman–rtrogman@dc.rr.com
Wow, you have the license for all those types? LOL
Do I spot Optima on there? I can’t support that, sorry. Even without the pro-McCain link it’s not a sans in my book. ;-)

I kind of like Optima being it there. It’s kind of like a private little joke between you and the shirt.

I ordered mine yesterday, and I eagerly anticipate its arrival!
